PSCT.Base: Set 1 "Magic Cylinder" directly from your Deck or GY. If Set from the Deck, it can be activated this turn. When you activate "Magic Cylinder": You can banish this card from your GY; double that damage inflicted to your opponent. You can only use this effect of "Magical Cylinders" once per turn.
